function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continued reporting of new cases of COVID-19 in different parts of the globe","Impact":"Risk of ongoing contagious disease propagation and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Stringent public health measures, increased testing and contact tracing, and global cooperation","Technologies":"Testing and contact tracing technologies, data analytics for monitoring and prediction","People":"Global population, healthcare systems, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Socio-economic impact of COVID-19 leading to a global recession","Impact":"Increased job loss, income inequality, and rise in global poverty","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus packages, social safety nets, and support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Economic modeling and analysis, financial support systems, digital payment platforms for aid distribution","People":"Global population, vulnerable communities, policymakers, economists","Owner":"Government agencies, policymakers, international organizations, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Projection of $9 trillion cumulative GDP loss due to COVID-19","Impact":"Severe economic downturn and financial instability","Mitigation":"Global economic cooperation, strategic investment, and recovery plans","Technologies":"Economic forecasting and modeling, investment tracking platforms, digital financial systems","People":"Global population, businesses, financial institutions, policymakers","Owner":"Global financial institutions, government agencies, international organizations"}]}
